td.content: s:patient presents with Kidney. she is having symptoms 3-4 times a week, in spite of treatment. she is a 78 year old female retired. Patient is a moderate drinker she does not smoke o:Height 59 in, Weight 102 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 65, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.

s:pt presents with 5 weeks history of Kidney. she is a white F aged 78 yrs. o:Height 60 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.
